mapper.update: MERGE INTO ( SELECT WARE_NO , BLD_CD , ADR_USE_YN FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') ) M1 USING ( SELECT WARE_NO , BLD_CD , ADR_USE_YN FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE APY_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') AND ADR_USE_YN = 'Y' ) M2 ON (M1.WARE_NO = M2.WARE_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET M1.BLD_CD = M2.BLD_CD , M1.ADR_USE_YN = M2.ADR_USE_YN
